subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett became the first seven-game winner in the majors as the Boston Red Sox beat the Toronto Blue Jays, 9-2, last night in Toronto. The Blue Jays lost their seventh in a row.
snippet: Josh Beckett became the first seven-game winner in the majors as the Boston Red Sox beat the Toronto Blue Jays, 9-2, last night in Toronto. The Blue Jays lost their seventh in a row.
